snippet: A federal judge Wednesday approved a Canadian company's last-minute $26 million cash offer for an eastern New Mexico peanut butter plant that went bankrupt after a salmonella outbreak and nationwide recall....

headline.print_headline: Canadian Firm Wins Bidding for Peanut Butter Plant
headline.main: Canadian Firm Wins Bidding for Peanut Butter Plant

lead_paragraph: A federal judge Wednesday approved a Canadian company's last-minute $26 million cash offer for an eastern New Mexico peanut butter plant that went bankrupt after a salmonella outbreak and nationwide recall.
